title: PBE Sign up Errors
body:
I'm having this problem where i can't sign up for PBE servers. either im gonna have the "something went wrong" error webpage. or "something has gone hextechnically wrong". is there anyway i can sign up for PBE? {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} 
{{summoner:6}}

replies.body: I went ahead and looked into your account, and it looks like we did get your application earlier this year in February. For now though, [**PBE signups**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) are down for maintenance.
Can you check if you got my application? Thank you. Also hope the problem will be fixed soon
